H0.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. Mozart

H1.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. Rossini

H2.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. Donizetti

H3.text: Whose last opera was Falstaff. VERDI

A4.text: Finally, six years later, appeared Falstaff, Verdi's only comedy apart from the early, ill-fated Un giorno di regno.
